mapper.select: SELECT id, NAME, price ,b.category_id,bc.category_name,b.image_url FROM brands b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE check_status=1 AND sell_status=1 LIMIT 50

SELECT id,address,b.category_id,bc.category_name,brand_no,name,combination_type,similar_no, scope,transaction_mode,price,start_date,end_date,image_url from brands b left join brand_category bc on b.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE id=#{brandId}
SELECT category_id,category_name FROM brand_category WHERE category_id=#{categoryId}

SELECT b.address,b.case_status,bc.category_id,bc.category_name,b.brand_no,b.name,b.combination_type,b.similar_no, b.scope,b.transaction_mode,b.price,b.app_person,b.app_date,b.publish_date,b.start_date,b.end_date,b.originality,b.image_url FROM brands b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE check_status=1 AND sell_status=1 AND b.category_id=#{categoryId}
SELECT count(*) FROM brands WHERE check_status=1 AND sell_status=1

SELECT id, NAME, price ,b.category_id,bc.category_name,b.image_url FROM brands b LEFT JOIN brand_category bc ON b.category_id = bc.category_id WHERE check_status=1 AND sell_status=1 ORDER BY b.category_id LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
